data.md:MetaData: (Table 46) Chemical composition of clay minerals filling interstices and fissures in basalts of tholeiite and alkaline series from the Emperor Mount Chain, DSDP Leg 55
9 cores, 59 m cored, 28.5 m drilled, 31.1 % recovery
